org.lasarobotics.vision.detection.objects

Class Contour

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.detection.objects.Detectable
      • org.lasarobotics.vision.detection.objects.Contour

  • public class Contour
extends Detectable
    Implements a single contour (MatOfPoint) with advanced measurement utilities

    • Constructor Summary
